name: Ironclad

auras.raw_description: Increases Ally HP in all Battles by

skills.name: Wallop
skills.raw_description:
Attacks 1 enemy. Has a 25% chance of placing a 100% [Heal Reduction] debuff for 2 turns.
Damage based on: [HP] [ATK]
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%

skills.name: Amok
skills.raw_description:
Removes 1 random debuff from all allies. Places a 25% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns.
Lvl. 2 Cooldown -1

skills.name: Blood Burst
skills.raw_description: When healed, will attack all enemies inflicting damage proportional to any surplus heal. Damage inflicted is equal to 50% of any surplus heal.
